item.title: VoiSum
item.description: Our Goal In today’s fast-paced world, we’re aiming to transform how people consume voice messages by creating an AI-powered solution that cuts through the noise. Our tool takes those rambling voice notes and delivers just the essential content - no fluff, no filler words, just the key points you need. By combining speech-to-text, smart summarization, and voice synthesis, we’re not just saving time - we’re making voice communication more efficient while keeping it personal.
